description: Porter was really impressed with what Darryl was packing in those shorts and wanted to take a peek at that big dick of his while they were out for a walk. Darryl was adorably nervous about the whole thing, “I don’t know how I feel about doing it out here…” Porter teased a bit, “I know how I feel about it!” In the end, they went back to the house to introduce Darryl’s “snake” to Porter…let’s just say they both got along very well!
title: Darryl & Porter: Bareback
